content: this pattern is worked using amigurumi method work sts continuously in a spiral without closing each round with slip_stitch mark first st of each round with st marker moving it up as you go frill is worked in row turning work at end of each row parts are made separately and then assembled cc as follows work final st in old colour to final 2 lps on hook yoh with new colour and draw new colour through lps on hook to finish **list of materials** **scheepjes softfun** 60% cotton 40% acrylic 50g/140m -yarn a 2606 moss x 1 ball -yarn b 2622 latte x 1 ball -yarn c 2533 wheat x 1 ball -yarn d 2621 mustard x 1 ball 2 5mm crochet hook 1 x stitch marker 2 x ø 10mm animal safety eyes polyester stuffing *trico the triceratops is one of many designs published by scheepjes in their yarn - the after party booklets released with a new design every 2 weeks also available in print from scheepjes stockists *
